net.corda.flows

Class BroadcastTransactionFlow

  • FlowLogic
    • net.corda.flows.BroadcastTransactionFlow

  • public class BroadcastTransactionFlow
extends FlowLogic

    Notify the specified parties about a transaction. The remote peers will download this transaction and its dependency graph, verifying them all. The flow returns when all peers have acknowledged the transactions as valid. Normally you wouldn't use this directly, it would be called via class FinalityFlow.

    See Also:
    class FinalityFlow

    • Constructor Detail

      • BroadcastTransactionFlow

        public BroadcastTransactionFlow(SignedTransaction notarisedTransaction,
                                java.util.Set<net.corda.core.crypto.Party> participants)

        Notify the specified parties about a transaction. The remote peers will download this transaction and its dependency graph, verifying them all. The flow returns when all peers have acknowledged the transactions as valid. Normally you wouldn't use this directly, it would be called via class FinalityFlow.

        Parameters:
        notarisedTransaction - transaction which has been notarised (if needed) and is ready to notify nodes about.
        participants - a list of participants involved in the transaction.
        See Also:
        class FinalityFlow
